Room.Name: Inside a Tavern
Room.Description: You are inside a dimly-lit room. The atmosphere makes you feel uncomfortable. In front of you stands a mysterious gypsy. She whispers 'Your fate and destiny lie beyond this world.' You are still wondering what she means when you suddenly notice the crystal ball ... it glows fiercely and displays the Universe!

Room.Name: Inside the Crystal Ball
Room.Description: You have touched the crystal ball and find that you have gone inside it: a world of stars and wonders! As you look back you figure out there is no choice but to go forward.

Room.Name: Inside the Galaxy
Room.Description: You are now inside the galaxy, around you you see stars and nebulae smiling at your presence, and comets and meteors wandering around you. You realize that this world may not be the true galaxy after all, but just another fantasy zone. Exits lie virtually in all directions.

Room.Name: On an InterGalactic Walkway
Room.Description: You are on a well-paved path which seems that it was made deliberately for visitors like you. The walkway continues north and a small exit lies west.

Room.Name: End of the InterGalactic Walkway
Room.Description: You notice the walkway has come to an abrupt end and you wonder why. You see that there is still a small path which leads north and one to the west. To the east lies a bridge.

Room.Name: At the Undeveloped Part of the Galaxy
Room.Description: This place looks deserted, covered with space debris. Not a sign of life is around.

Room.Name: On the Bridge of Stars
Room.Description: This bridge has been made by the stars to honour their ancestors. The bridge itself shines brightly and makes you feel that you are walking on a path of light. An entrance to an ancient building lies north and to the east lies the Milky Way.

Room.Name: On the Bridge of Nebulae
Room.Description: This bridge, like the other, was made as a memorial. The nebulae had to make one just to show that they are as capable as the stars. North lies a throne room.

Room.Name: The Throne Room of the Nebula King
Room.Description: You can only faintly make out that it is a throne room as it is too dark in here. In the middle is an empty throne. You wonder where the King has gone, maybe he is hiding from you?

Room.Name: At the Start of the Milky Way
Room.Description: It is here that the famous old Milky Way starts flowing. You are surrounded by streams of mist the moment you tread on it. You can't see well in here ... luckily you haven't fallen yet!

Room.Name: Along the Milky Way
Room.Description: You are still travelling inside this path of mist. You notice a small opening to the east.

Room.Name: At the End of the Milky Way
Room.Description: Just as you started enjoying this journey inside the mist, you have come to the end of it. West leads to a bridge and east leads to somewhere else.

Room.Name: A Small Clearing
Room.Description: You are inside a small clearing. You can see that there are signs of a living creature nearby.

Room.Name: An Edge of the Galaxy
Room.Description: You are on the very edge of the galaxy. Nothing is here except that there is a path which leads down.

Room.Name: Very Near to a Gigantic Star
Room.Description: You are very near to a gigantic red star. While you are still fascinated by its beauty, the star keeps on growing ... suddenly you realize that you'd better leave.

Room.Name: Too Bright to Tell
Room.Description: Indeed it is too bright to tell. Because what you are witnessing is the rare event of a Supernova, how a star explodes itself into galactic dust. You may find yourself lucky to witness this rare event but even luckier, you have finally got out of this galaxy as your body turns into dust. That really HURTS!

Room.Name: The Star Cluster
Room.Description: You are inside the home of the stars. All you can see around you are stars and nothing else. You eyes become pretty hurt as you look at them.

Room.Name: Another Edge of the Galaxy
Room.Description: This is another uninhabited place. Exits lie north, east and south.

Room.Name: Corner of the Galaxy
Room.Description: You wonder why the galaxy is limited. All you have done in Astronomy courses now prove worthless. Well who told you to take one at the start?

Room.Name: Lost in Space
Room.Description: You are now lost in space. Compasses don't work here, sorry. What's more you can sense darkness engulfing you. You'd better get out quick.

Room.Name: Black Hole
Room.Description: Well you have chosen the wrong path, sorry. Nothing can escape from this monster, not even light. PANIC! You can't escape!

Room.Name: The Homes of the Pleiades
Room.Description: This is where the famous Seven Sisters live. You'd better not disturb them.

Room.Name: Western Side of the Temple
Room.Description: You are still wandering around this temple. You notice exits lie in all directions except west.

Room.Name: Orion's Hunting Lodge
Room.Description: This is dedicated to the Great Hunter of all time -- Orion. Scattered on the floor is the famous hunting equipment used by him.

Room.Name: Northern Side of the Temple
Room.Description: You are still wandering around this temple. You notice exits lie in all directions except north.

Room.Name: The Offering Chamber
Room.Description: This is the sacred offering chamber in which sacrifices are made. You see a young girl here, chained to the wall, as if she is waiting for execution. You look up and realize the chains are sent down directly from above. Below you recognize the temple of Thalos.

Room.Name: The Entrance of the Ancient Temple
Room.Description: You have entered into this old temple, which was built originally for the gods in Mount Olympia, but it is now deserted as someone took over this part of the Universe.

Room.Name: Hercules' Mighty Throne
Room.Description: You stand before the throne of a long-forgotten hero. It is full of bounty that he got from the Ten Labours.

Room.Name: Eastern Side of the Temple
Room.Description: You are still wandering around this temple. You notice exits lie in all directions except east.

Room.Name: Perseus' Chamber
Room.Description: It is the chamber of the prince, Perseus. However, he seems not to be here. Maybe he has gone to get Pegasus to save Andromeda?

Room.Name: On the Mystic Chains
Room.Description: You are dangling on the chains. You notice exits lie in all directions. Up above you see the chains continue upwards. But a forcefield prevents you from going further upwards.

Exit.Description: You see the forcefield of Spring.

Room.Name: On a Hill
Room.Description: Suddenly you find yourself on a hillside. As you look around, you notice that Spring has descended upon you.

Room.Name: Inside a Spanish Bull-Ring
Room.Description: You are inside what used to be a ground for bull fighting. But you notice there are no Matadors around. Maybe they are all dead?

Room.Name: Inside a study
Room.Description: This is a strange study. Besides the desks and chairs you also see a large mirror in the middle. So, you wonder, is this how you make a Gemini into two Gemini?

Room.Name: Along the seashore
Room.Description: You start to feel the heat of Summer. Amongst the rocky beach you notice hidden forms which could be camouflaged crabs.

Room.Name: Within the Deep Jungle
Room.Description: Nearby you can hear the roar of an animal. Peering through the dense overgrowth you think you glimpse a pair of menacing eyes.

Room.Name: Inside a Luxurious Bedroom
Room.Description: A peaceful feeling overtakes you. You see a magnificent four-poster bed. It's a double bed and there is only room for one more! Well, what now ... ?

Room.Name: The Supreme Court
Room.Description: You are standing inside the dock of a court. You feel an overwhelming sense of guilt and you want to protest your innocence! You fear retribution and feel yourself exposed, just like the trees in Autumn.

Room.Name: In the Dry Desert
Room.Description: You are confused by the shifting sands around you. Through the shimmering heat you see the hazy outline of a giant scorpion ... is this a mirage?

Room.Name: In the Woods
Room.Description: You find yourself in the center of a Centaurion hunting party. You'd better hide yourself before you become the 'center attraction'!

Room.Name: On a Mountain Peak
Room.Description: You are on the highest peak of the Universe. You look around and notice clouds below you. One of the clouds resembles a goat-like form.

Room.Name: Inside a Waterfall
Room.Description: The noise is deafening. You are about to take a drink when you realize that the water is being poured out of a vessel of mind-boggling proportions!

Room.Name: Inside a Gigantic Clam
Room.Description: You feel uneasy here as if some evil magic is being cast on you. You suspect something fishy is going on in here.

Room.Name: End of the Mystic Chains
Room.Description: You have reached the end of the mystic chains. Looking up, you notice a small landing on which you can climb. However, there seems to be another forcefield blocking your way.

Exit.Description: You see the forcefield of Summer.
You see the forcefield of Spring.

Room.Name: On the Draco
Room.Description: You realize you are standing on scaly ground. As you wonder what the ground is made of, you feel the ground move.

Room.Name: Tail of the Draco
Room.Description: At last you realize that you are on a giant snake-like dragon called the Draco, the guardian of the inner galaxy. You realize that the Draco is actually flying now!

Room.Name: Path of the Draco
Room.Description: As you struggle along this scaly creature you realize that the only way you can reach to the inner galaxy is by going all the way to the head.

Room.Name: Near the Legs of Draco
Room.Description: You are approaching the leg part of this creature. You look around and see that the surrounding is all dark except for some faint lights from the distant stars.

Room.Name: On the Back of Draco
Room.Description: At last you are half way through this long, weary journey. You can see the wings are to the east but it seems that another forcefield is in the way.

Exit.Description: You see the forcefield of Autumn.

Room.Name: Between the Wings of Draco
Room.Description: You hear some giant flapping sounds nearby. You desperately try to get hold of something as the forceful gusts sweep you away.

Room.Name: Near the Arms of Draco
Room.Description: From above you can faintly make out the gigantic arms which extend far beyond into the darkness.

Room.Name: On the Neck of Draco
Room.Description: Your journey is now approaching the end. However, this neck seems to be endless.

Room.Name: Approaching the Head of Draco
Room.Description: You have come to the end of Draco, but you can't find the head! You see a forcefield to the south, some distance away, beyond reach. If only the head were here ...

Exit.Description: You see the forcefield of Winter.

Room.Name: At the Entrance of the Great Dipper
Room.Description: Now you are in the innermost part of the galaxy. What you are walking on now is the path of the Great Dipper or the Plough. You notice that there are seven rooms in this zone, representing the seven stars of the Dipper.

Exit.Description: You see the forcefield of Winter.

Room.Name: Cassiopeia's Throne
Room.Description: This is the Throne room of the Queen of the Universe. From here you can see every star and constellation in the Universe.

Room.Name: Along the Path of the Dipper
Room.Description: You see stars around you but nothing of special interest.

Room.Name: Cepheus' Throne
Room.Description: This is the Throne room of the King of the Universe. From here you can see every star and constellation in the Universe.

Room.Name: Along the path of the Dipper
Room.Description: You see stars around you but nothing of special interest.

Room.Name: Along the path of the Dipper
Room.Description: You see stars around you but nothing of special interest.

Room.Name: End of the Dipper
Room.Description: You have finished the path of the Dipper. Here, the most prominent feature is a set of claw-marks. You also notice a room to the south; it looks as if Polaris could lie here.

Room.Name: The Polar Star
Room.Description: You have entered the private chamber of Polaris. This is a room of great significance. You can see a powerful telescope pointing down towards the Universe (SNOOPING!). It is from here that Polaris commands the Universe. You feel you have come to end of your search in this galaxy ...

NPC.name: poor mudder
NPC.description: You will become him if you are not careful.
NPC.longDescription: A poor mudder, lost in this place.

NPC.name: star
NPC.description: You can't tell what the star looks like, she is too bright!
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful white star smiles at you.

NPC.name: nebula young
NPC.description: It hasn't got a definite shape, it is just a cloud of mist.
NPC.longDescription: A young nebula, waiting to become a star.

NPC.name: comet speedy
NPC.description: You see the offspring of Halley's comet, here just to wipe everything out.
NPC.longDescription: A speedy comet is waiting to crush your head in.

NPC.name: red supergiant
NPC.description: You notice the giant is not as tough as his name sounds ... Still he can be very powerful.
NPC.longDescription: An enormous, red supergiant is forced to protect the galaxy.

NPC.name: white dwarf
NPC.description: Like the red giant, he is also appointed to stand guard for the galaxy. But somehow he manages to escape. Though tiny, it can take a lot of hits!
NPC.longDescription: A tiny white dwarf is trying to sneak away from duty.

NPC.name: horsehead nebula
NPC.description: You can only make out its shape from the darkness. He was cursed to stay in here and his face may never be seen by anyone again.
NPC.longDescription: A huge nebula is here, resembling a horsehead.

NPC.name: andromeda
NPC.description: She was once a princess of beauty. However, her beauty has led to a Goddess's jealousy and she has to suffer here endlessly until Perseus comes.
NPC.longDescription: The poor Andromeda is chained to the wall, suffering ...

NPC.name: hercules
NPC.description: He has been put to do the Ten Labours -- ten impossible tasks, by Hera, the queen goddess, who disliked him. But he finished them all and at the end was granted immortality. He is a very brave and strong fighter.
NPC.longDescription: The Mighty Hercules is working hard on his extra Labours for the Gods.

NPC.name: pegasus
NPC.description: It is the legendary horse with wings on its back.
NPC.longDescription: The wild pegasus is grazing peacefully.

NPC.name: orion
NPC.description: He is the legendary hunter who almost defeated Taurus the bull, but got killed by Scorpio. The gods put them both up as constellations but one appears on one side of the sky and the other the other side so they will never meet.
NPC.longDescription: Orion is still hunting for Scorpio.

NPC.name: pleiades
NPC.description: These are the seven sisters of the Myths, and as for why they are here, no one knows; even the Gods themselves have forgotten.
NPC.longDescription: The Pleiades are here, weeping for the loss of their sisters.

NPC.name: draco head
NPC.description: This evil-looking head is even larger than a giant. He is the last guardian before entering the inner galaxy. His neck is flexing in a random fashion so hitting the head is certainly not easy.
NPC.longDescription: The gigantic Head of Draco lurks out from beneath and prepares to roast you.

NPC.name: draco baby
NPC.description: You see a tiny creature which looks like a dragon except that its body resembles a snake. Gosh, is this a draco, you wonder, is this the thing we are on now?
NPC.longDescription: A baby draco is crawling on the Draco's body.

NPC.name: aries
NPC.description: You see a white goat here, the first guardian of the Zodiac, also the ruler of Spring. He looks as if he is expecting you.
NPC.longDescription: Aries is sitting here, welcoming you.

NPC.name: taurus
NPC.description: You see a wild-looking bull with a bad temper. He is well-built and looks like he can fight well ... indeed he has fought with Orion before and survived.
NPC.longDescription: Taurus wants to leave, but has been forced to stay as a guardian here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: gemini
NPC.description: As soon as you see him you know that he is the most perfect man you have seen. You can't find any imperfections on him.
NPC.longDescription: Gemini is looking for his brother; have you seen him?

NPC.name: gemini
NPC.description: As soon as you see him you see the most imperfect man you have ever seen. How can there be such a contrast? You wonder ...
NPC.longDescription: Gemini is hiding from his brother, grinning evilly at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: cancer
NPC.description: You see a gigantic crab (YES, it is bigger than you!) with a crushed shell. Legend is that he was crushed by Hercules when he was sent by Hera to kill him. So Hera made Cancer a constellation for his work.
NPC.longDescription: Cancer the crab is here, hoarding the treasure away from you.

NPC.name: leo
NPC.description: His metallic skin means that he could be the one which was killed by Hercules during his first Labour. His skin is so weapon-proof that Hercules had to use his bare hands to tear the lion into two from its mouth!
NPC.longDescription: Leo the lion is roaring at you, ready for a strike!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: virgo
NPC.description: From what you have seen, you now realize that legends are legends, and Virgo may not be the maid of chastity and purity at all! But still she looks gorgeous and is waiting for your first move, whatever it is ...
NPC.longDescription: Virgo is sitting here, winking at you suggestively ... you are alarmed!

NPC.name: libra
NPC.description: He is a wise old man and can see people's thoughts through their eyes.... Now all he can see from you is greed and bloodshed.
NPC.longDescription: Libra, the fair and just, is staring at you, weighing up the sins of your past.

NPC.name: scorpio
NPC.description: Ever since he killed Orion in the myths, he has been punished by having Sagittarius' arrow aimed at his heart forever.
NPC.longDescription: Scorpio is moving his tail towards you, waiting to put an end to some mortals.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: sagittarius
NPC.description: He is a centaur and a well trained archer. No one can escape his arrows.
NPC.longDescription: Sagittarius the centaur is waiting to let go of his well aimed arrow ...

NPC.name: capricorn
NPC.description: You see a mean-looking ram here. He used to be a fierce fighter in the ancient war but now the gods have decided to put him here, to live out the rest of his days in peace.
NPC.longDescription: Capricorn is here, feeling bored ... he wants a fight!

NPC.name: aquarius
NPC.description: The pretty Water Bearer is smiling at you, you think you'd better give her a hand with holding the vessel.
NPC.longDescription: The beautiful Aquarius is standing here, holding THE vessel.

NPC.name: pisces mermaid
NPC.description: She has been forced to serve her husband, who had been cursed to turn into a fish and she deserves your pity.
NPC.longDescription: Pisces the mermaid is sitting here, waiting for your help.

NPC.name: pisces fish
NPC.description: He was once a very handsome man but now has turned into an ugly big fish. So he becomes jealous of any living thing which is more handsome than him.
NPC.longDescription: Pisces the fish, is jealous of your approach...
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: bear ursa major
NPC.description: The Huge Bear which resides in the northern skies is here. You think you'd better turn back. At least you have got a chance of survival.
NPC.longDescription: Ursa Major the bear is the last defense against any intruders.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistRace

NPC.name: cassiopeia queen
NPC.description: She is the Queen of Dignity; facing her you feel all your dignity has gone.
NPC.longDescription: Cassiopeia, the queen of the Universe, is sitting on her throne.

NPC.name: cepheus king
NPC.description: He is the King of Might as well as of the Universe. You suddenly feel very weak and useless in front of him.
NPC.longDescription: Cepheus, the king of the Universe, is sitting on his throne.

NPC.name: polaris polar star
NPC.description: He is the Master of the Universe, (NOT He-Man!), the most powerful! Even the King and the Queen obey him. As you look at him you notice he is actually a STAR, with dazzling bright light ... maybe you shouldn't have come here at all?
NPC.longDescription: Polaris, the polar star, who commands the whole Universe, stands before you!

Item.Name: comet's tail
Item.LongDescription: A long, slender whip lies here.

Item.Name: arm hercules
Item.ShortDescription: the Titanic Arm plates of Hercules
Item.LongDescription: Arm plates of the Zodiac lie here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These mighty armors have been worn by this immortal, since the ancient time.

Item.Name: belt orion
Item.LongDescription: A belt of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You can immediately see that it belongs to Orion, from the three stars engraved on it.

Item.Name: skull draco
Item.LongDescription: A massive skull of a dead Draco lies here.

Item.Name: fleece aries
Item.LongDescription: A fleece of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: From a look it resembles the Golden Fleece that exists in the Greek myths.

Item.Name: hoof taurus
Item.LongDescription: A hoof of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is with these hooves that Taurus can stand against Orion's attacks.

Item.Name: mask gemini
Item.LongDescription: A mask of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You notice the mask has got two faces, one smiling and the other crying. You don't know which way you should wear it.

Item.Name: shell cancer
Item.LongDescription: A shell of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A shell which is dented in the middle, resulting from the Hercules' mighty pound when the Crab was still an enemy of Hercules in ancient times.

Item.Name: skin leo
Item.LongDescription: A skin of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A skin made of metal, which was worn by Hercules during his Ten Labours.

Item.Name: bracelet virgo
Item.LongDescription: A bracelet of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A bracelet of purity and youth, only worn by selected virgins.

Item.Name: scale libra
Item.LongDescription: A shield of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a shield of justice, used in the ancient battle against injustice.

Item.Name: scale libra
Item.LongDescription: A shield of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a shield of injustice, it picks on the innocent.

Item.Name: sting scorpio
Item.LongDescription: Sting of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This dreadful weapon put a lot of mortals to death before Scorpio was banished.

Item.Name: arrow sagittarius
Item.LongDescription: The Arrow of Sagittarius lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's an arrow of lightning; it will never miss any target.

Item.Name: bow sagittarius
Item.LongDescription: The Titanic Bow of Sagittarius lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The gigantic bow used by the Archer; it is a very powerful weapon.

Item.Name: horns capricon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of horns of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These strange horns are the work of gods, shaped to fit on hands. They look powerful indeed.

Item.Name: vessel aquarius
Item.LongDescription: A vessel of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This vessel has been carried by the Water Bearer ever since she came to the Zodiac.

Item.Name: tail pisces
Item.LongDescription: A fish tail of the Zodiac lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This tail can actually be worn by mortals somehow as leggings ... another work of the gods.

Item.Name: ring dignity
Item.LongDescription: A ring of specialty lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This ring belongs to Cassiopeia, queen of the Universe. Mortals, do not touch!

Item.Name: sceptre might
Item.LongDescription: A sceptre of interest lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You'd better give it back, or the king of the Universe will punish you.

Item.Name: ring universe
Item.LongDescription: Here lies a fortune ... a small ring of power.

ExtraDescription.Description: It conceals the power of the universe.

Item.Name: great dipper
Item.ShortDescription: the Great Dipper of the Skies
Item.LongDescription: A dazzling white object lies on the ground.

Item.Name: spring shoot
Item.LongDescription: A shoot grows here, covered with dew.

Item.Name: summer flower
Item.LongDescription: A flower grows here, waiting to be picked up.

Item.Name: autumn leaf
Item.LongDescription: A leaf lies here, as if just fallen from a tree.

Item.Name: winter branch
Item.LongDescription: A branch lies here, still covered with snow.

Item.Name: chains andromeda
Item.LongDescription: Some chains lie on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: They certainly look important!
